overview: My research centers on cancer prevention and treatment among diverse populations with an emphasis on anal cancer screening, prevention, and therapy. I focus on high-risk populations including sexual and gender minority (LGBTQ+), persons living with HIV, and Latinx patients.
research_interests:
Dr. Sanchez's research interests are focused on anal cancer and colorectal cancer prevention. He has a special interest in minority health including Latino and gay populations.
  *
